title: Roasted Chicken and Veggies
directions: Season both sides of chicken with salt and pepper
Put in your bean pot or cooking dish of choice
Cook at 350 for 3 hours or until chicken is cooked and veggies are tender
This made my house smell SO yummy! Made it smell like I slaved over the meal lol. Little did my family know I dumped it all in a dish and let the stove do all of the cooking .
Tayna shared this and says....I made this in my bean pot. If you don't have one cook it however you would normally cook a roast.
ingredients: 4 bone in skin on chicken breasts...
2 cans Cream (of your choice soup) I used celery and mushroom
